REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f0182 reute d f BC-<TOFRUZEN-INC>-IN-DIS 03-11 0044

TEXT.TITLE: <TOFRUZEN INC> IN DISTRIBUTION AGREEMENT
TEXT.BODY: Tofruzen Inc said King Soopers and City Markets, two supermarket chains, have tentatively agreed to carry the company's Tofruzen frozen dessert in all their Colorado stores after a 14-month test market. Reuter
